

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(glue)
library(plotly)
```



```{r}
population <- read_csv("WPP2019_TotalPopulationBySex.csv")
```





```{r}
#rename

rename_ <- population %>%
  filter(Location == "Iran (Islamic Republic of)") %>%
  rename(Location = `Iran (Islamic Republic of)`,n = `Iran`)



```







```{r}
ppp <- population %>%
  select(Location, Time, PopTotal, Variant) %>%
  filter(Location == "Asia" | Location =="Europe"| Location =="Africa"| Location =="North America"| Location =="South America"| Location =="Oceania"| Location =="India"| Location =="United States of America"| Location =="China"| Location =="Canada") %>%
  filter(Variant=="High") %>%
 
    group_by(Location)
```





```{r}
ggplot(ppp, aes(Time,PopTotal, color=Location))+
  geom_line()
# + scale_y_log10()
```
